meaning: stature, height, back, behind, disobey, defy, go back on, rebel

onyomiExamples.meaning: back, rear, background, behind the scenes
background, scenery, backdrop, setting, background (of an incident, situation, etc.), circumstances, context, backing, support (from behind the scenes)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: back, spine, reverse, rear side, height, stature, ridge (of a mountain)
chiton (any marine mollusk of the class Polyplacophora), sea cradle, Japanese chiton (Acanthopleura japonica)
to run counter to, to go against, to disobey, to infringe
to turn (one's face) away, to avert (one's eyes)
